TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

Docs.summary: Represents a tag that contains [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) that is run when the rule is matched.
Creates an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このコンス トラクターを作成するセマンティック解釈タグを持つ<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag.Script%2A>プロパティには、空の文字列が含まれています。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string script) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the class, specifying the script contents of the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このコンス トラクターを作成するセマンティック解釈タグを持つ<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag.Script%2A>プロパティの値に`script`です。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Script { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Script : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.
Docs.value: タグのセマンティクス解釈スクリプトを含む文字列です。
Docs.exception: An attempt is made to set **Script** to .
